title: Smart Watch for Women Men with 1.7" Touching Screen IP67 Waterproof Fitness Watch with Fitness Mode,Sleep Monitor,Sports Smart Watches
features: 【1.7 inches Large HD Color touc-hing Screen】 1.7 large color screen and full screen touc-hing.
【Multi Sports Modes】As a fitness recorder watch,supports more sports modes to record your workout. Connect your phone's to measure accurate activity data and see your fitness targets.

【Health Detection】Sleep monitor, stopwatch, countdown, weather display, breathe, message reminder, alarm clock reminder, sedentary reminder, find phone, music control, take pictures, raise the wrist to bright-en the screen, etc.
【Smart Notifications & Compatibility】Remind you of the incoming calls, text messages and so on, and support control the music playback on your smartphone.
【IP67 Waterproof & Long-Lasting Battery】Smart watch is rated IP67 waterproof standard. Rain, hand washing are not a problem.
